details.summary: Validate whether Update Contact API should return error when setting invalid email for a contact
details.description:
Example of negative test case. As we are setting invalid email for email field, the API should return in such case.

This API returns the static error response in such scenario. Such type of responses are proper candidate for Default Validator.

content.name: John Doe
content.aboutMe: My name can be used as a placeholder name and I don't have any identity.
